forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 52. West southwest wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Drizzle then Partly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle before 11am. Partly sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, a gentle mist clings to the earth, hinting at the moody charm that coastal living embraces so well. The air feels cool and crisp, whispering secrets of a low hanging fog that converses with the skyline. A slight chance of drizzle lingers in the forecast, a tender reminder of the city’s unpredictable whims, while a soothing west-southwest breeze dances along at a leisurely pace. As the day unfolds, expect a teasing revelation of sun, promising a high that will flirt with sixty degrees before retreating to a more comfortable chill by afternoon.

With the clouds softening in their resolve, one might consider layering their attire wisely, perhaps wrapping themselves in a light cardigan or a soft scarf that can be easily shed as the warmth of the day teases through. A stroll through the neighborhood, indulging in the aroma of fresh coffee wafting from corner cafés, seems a fitting way to embrace the morning. Later, as the skies gradually clear, the charm of wandering through the local shops or perhaps finding a quiet nook in one of the city’s many parks will entice those seeking solace among the urban bustle. A day in San Francisco always holds promise, even when draped in the gentle hues of gray.
